full_summary:
**Rental of Mobile Offices**
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01023803
**Publication Date:** January 30, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

The Public Service and Procurement Canada seeks to establish a Standing Offer Agreement with one or two office-style job site trailer rental companies. The Standing Offer is intended to provide portable offices and storage areas to meet the needs of event programming components at official Public Service and Procurement Canada sites.

**Scope of Work:**
The Contractor shall provide job site trailers that meet or exceed the typical needs of the Department's winter and summer events. The trailers must be in good condition and provide adequate electrical and storage facilities.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The tenders will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Compliance with the Department's requirements and specifications
* Quality of the job site trailers, including electrical and storage facilities
* Deliveries and pickup services, including the ability to deliver and collect trailers within six days per week
* Pricing and value for money

**Contract Period:**
The Standing Offer Agreement will be issued for a period of one year with two additional option years.

**Security Requirements:**
The successful Contractor must be aware of the security requirements for performing work on Parliament Hill. This includes obtaining Security Clearance for their personnel before commencing work.

**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**How to Obtain Documents:**
The solicitation documents, including the Amendment 001, can be downloaded from the Government of Canada’s Buy and Sell website.

**How to Submit Tenders:**
Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada’s Buy and Sell website.

**Contact Information:**
For more information regarding this tender, please contact Nicholas Stocker, Public Service and Procurement Canada at [nicholas.stocker@pch.gc.ca](
